thread.title: Amazing Le Burgundy
thread.title_full: Amazing Le Burgundy - Review of Hotel Le Burgundy, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Sue G
title: Amazing Le Burgundy
text: What a marvelous find on the right bank in a great location. From the greeting at the door to the fabulous rooms and their amenities it was such a pleasure to stay at this little gem. DÃ©cor was fresh and interesting . Common areas were bright and cheery but could be intimate also. Noise canceling shades were very effective although a somewhat quiet street compared to other parts of Paris. The restaurant is unbelievable and sommelier knows his wines very well. Definitely a great property on the right bank for convenient walking to the Opera, shopping, the Seine and multiple restaurants.
